text: Apollinaire Joachim Kyélem de Tambèla (born 1955) is a Burkinabe politician, lawyer and writer. In October 2022, he became the Prime Minister of Burkina Faso, following the September 2022 Burkina Faso coup d'état. On 6 December 2024, he was removed as Prime Minister by Traoré. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Burkina Faso
title: Apollinaire J. Kyélem de Tambèla
